name: Nakivo
tag_list: rass, vm-replication, vm-replication-software, vmware-replication, replication-performance, vmware-replication-software, vmware-replication-over-wan, vmware-server-replication, disaster-recovery-software, disaster-recovery-solution, disaster-
overview:
Nakivo has redefined VM Backup and Replication for Small Business with the first simple, reliable, fast and affordable solution that enables VMware disaster recovery and business continuity.

With Nakivo Backup & Replication, the industry has a new ESX(i) protection solution available to Small Business and their VMware systems integrators, that is designed, built and priced for Small Business.

Nakivo has focused on the requirements of Small Business, delivering simplicity for their users and fast easy Web access for their VMware system integrator often providing remote virtual IT support. Nakivo Backup & Replication can be installed and used by almost anyone, even without training or reading a user manual.

Nakivo Backup and Replication is • Fast, Simple and Reliable VMware protection for Small Business. • Perfect for Small Business managers with a conservative IT budget, who would prefer to pay a mid-range price for easier to use functionality designed specifically for their requirements.

Nakivo Backup and Replication provides the • Easiest to use and most intuitive user interface while also being browser based for easy access from anywhere at any time. • Fastest VM replication functionality including support for near-CDP, CBT, VSS, LAN, WAN, SAN, compression and encryption. • Simplest to install and configure, within 5 minutes a new user can install Nakivo, as well as create & run a new job.

Nakivo Backup & Replication is a VM backup and replication solution that works across SANs, LANs and WANs to help Small Business protect their VMware based data, applications and business services.

Nakivo Backup and Replication for Small Business is reliable, much simpler to use, and often faster than other leading solutions. Nakivo provides near real-time continuous data protection (CDP) for meeting recovery point objectives (RPOs) of as close as five minutes, utilizes change block tracking (CBT) for transmitting and storing only changed data and supports protecting live applications such as Microsoft Exchange, Active Directory and SQL.

With Nakivo’s affordable pricing, Nakivo Backup and Replication is easy to own, by delivering the best price to value ratio for Small Business.

More info can be found at http://www.nakivo.com
